results.content: Video 54 should go after some of the videos in section 8 (they're out of order). The course involved a lot of just copying what the instructor was doing, and there wasn't enough explaining of what the code was doing.
results.content_html: Video 54 should go after some of the videos in section 8 (they're out of order). The course involved a lot of just copying what the instructor was doing, and there wasn't enough explaining of what the code was doing.

results.content: Good course with a GREAT teacher! Seriously...this guy goes above and beyond to answer and accommodate you!  I took a bit off because the HTML isn't naturally responsive (although you can put your own responsive front end in). I prefer chrome over Firefox ..bit that's my issue and in the scope of his teaching, not relevant   I would highly recommend this class; it gives you a better taste of programming than a lot of beginning Dev classes (no "hello world!"). I liked it so much, I bought more classes from him.
